ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When We rescued him and all his family -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Wherefore We saved him and his entire family
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Call to mind) when We delivered him and all his kinsfolk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We rescued him and his whole family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When We rescued him and his entire household.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When We saved him and his family, all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When We delivered him and his followers, all--
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when We delivered him and his people all together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When We saved him and his household, every one,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We saved him and all his people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Recall what time We delivered him and his household, all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When We delivered him and all his family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, We delivered him and his adherents, all
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When We saved him and his family, all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We saved him and all his kinsmen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We saved him and his family, all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:134] mention, when We delivered him together with all his family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When We saved him and his household) his two daughters: Za'ura and Raytha, (every one,
